item.title: Dollar drops against peers, euro gains after US jobs data

review.headline_rewrite: Dollar drops against peers, euro gains after US jobs data
bullets: dollar extended losses on Wednesday against major currencies, including the yen, Swiss franc, and euro, after economic data showed weakening labor demand, strengthening market
Treasury yields fell after the jobs data.
The 2-year note yield, which typically moves in step with interest rate expectations for the Federal Reserve, fell 4.6 basis points to 3.613%.

item.title: GST Council Approves New Slabs: 40% on luxury goods, 5% on essentials

review.headline_rewrite: GST Council Approves New Slabs: 40% on luxury goods, 5% on essentials
bullets: Some statesâ€™ demand to be compensated for the revenue loss owing to the rate cut was not approved.
Key essential items such as toothpaste, hair oil, soaps, etc, have been brought in the 5 per cent slab.
